scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:types
scripts.build:copy: cp -a tsconfig.json src vendor test dist/ && rm -rf dist/test/ts-use
scripts.build:types: npm run build:copy && cd dist && tsc --build
scripts.build:vendor: npm run build:vendor:varint && npm run build:vendor:base-x
scripts.test:cjs: npm run build:js && mocha dist/cjs/node-test/test-*.js && npm run test:cjs:browser
scripts.test:esm: npm run build:js && mocha dist/esm/node-test/test-*.js && npm run test:esm:browser
scripts.test:ts: npm run build:types && npm run test --prefix test/ts-use
scripts.test:original: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:esm && npm run test:ts
scripts.test:ci: npm run lint && npm run test:node && npm run test:esm && npm run test:cjs && npm run test:ts
scripts.coverage: c8 --reporter=html mocha test/test-*.js && npm_config_yes=true npx st -d coverage -p 8080
scripts.clean: git add test/fixtures && git stash -- test/fixtures && git stash drop && rm -rf test/temp
